title: Update Manager.List() to populate ParentBranch with tests
description:
Update Manager.List() to read metadata and populate ParentBranch for each worktree.

Files to modify:
- internal/worktree/worktree.go (implementation)
- internal/worktree/worktree_test.go (tests)

Implementation:
1. After parseWorktreeList(), iterate through worktrees
2. For each worktree, call readMetadata(wt.Path) to get ParentBranch
3. Populate wt.ParentBranch field

Tests to write:
1. TestManager_List_PopulatesParentBranch - create worktree, call List(), verify ParentBranch field is populated correctly
2. TestManager_List_MissingMetadata - verify graceful handling when .tk-metadata doesn't exist (ParentBranch should be empty)

Write tests alongside implementation.
acceptance_criteria: go test ./internal/worktree/... -run 'TestManager_List_PopulatesParentBranch|TestManager_List_MissingMetadata' -v passes with both test names visible
closed_reason: Updated Manager.List() to populate ParentBranch from metadata. Added two tests: TestManager_List_PopulatesParentBranch and TestManager_List_MissingMetadata.
